entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
